thread.title: UberPUPPIES will hand-deliver cuteness to Denver on Thursday
thread.title_full: UberPUPPIES will hand-deliver cuteness to Denver on Thursday

author: Danika Worthington
title: UberPUPPIES will hand-deliver cuteness to Denver on Thursday
text:
UberPUPPIES will hand-deliver cuteness to Denver on Thursday UberPUPPIES is offering 15 minutes of puppy snuggles Thursday for $30 Print Squirt, the 12-week-old puppy that represented the Denver Dumb Friends League at the 2017 Puppy Bowl. The animal shelter is supplying puppies for your petting pleasure on Thursday via UberPUPPIES. (Provided by Denver Dumb Friends League) 
Prepare yourself mentally, physically, emotionally, spiritually, metaphysically and any other “ly” that’s necessary: The puppies are coming. 
UberPUPPIES will be delivering pups from the Denver Dumb Friends League Thursday from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m., bringing cheer, love, kisses, tail wags and all that is right in the world to your workplace. 
Tapping “PUPPIES” at the bottom of the Uber app will bring two lil’ pups for 15 minutes of snuggles for $30. 
But be warned: If this event goes anything like Uber’s Denver ugly-sweater debacle in December , you’ll have to remain vigilant if you want to beat out other Denverites for puppy petting. 285
